attributes.action: Transgender women are women. Make it law that transwomen are protected as women.
attributes.additional_details: Transwomen to be defined as women and transmen to be defined as men. Not being biological at birth,  due to sex assigned is not grounds for discrimination against a gender. This is also an issue for intersex births. People should have the right to their own bodies not what someone else deems what a man or women should look like or be. Society has become to ingrossed in beauty standards and culture wars, this hate and separation has to begin in parliament.
attributes.background: We all want people to feel safe -that means transwomen too, a law was passed meaning the definition of a woman is purely biological- this is a massive blow to the community and womens rights it doesn't protect cis-gendered women or transwomen. Being a women is more then how you are born.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Amend Equality Act to define the terms woman and man not based on biological sex
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725223
